Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、<Hilda>……居場所ってヤツ…… それって、人から与えてもらうもんなのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Hilda>... About having a place to belong... Is that really something that can be given to you by others?

Entry.JapaneseText: おれには、その、ハーフって事のつらさや 苦しみってのはわからない。でもな……
Entry.EnglishText: I have no clue about the sort of pain and suffering that Halfs go through. But...

Entry.JapaneseText: おれなら、自分で居場所を作ろうって、 思うんだけどなぁ……ムリヤリにでも。
Entry.EnglishText: If it were me, I think I would carve out my own place where I belong... Even if I had to do it by force.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう、ボクたちの仲間になった時も、 自分で勝手に決めたんだもんネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, just like when you decided for yourself to join us.
...Carving out a place where I belong...
